articles.content: Colombian President Iván Duque Márquez weighed in on the controversy surrounding the upcoming Summit of the Americas, saying dictatorships should be unwelcome, while chaos continues to swirl around t… [+9098 chars]

articles.title: 21 Americans Infected With Monkeypox, C.D.C. Reports - The New York Times
articles.description: As the number of cases outside Africa approaches 800, governments are scrambling for a limited pool of vaccines and treatments with unclear effectiveness.
articles.content:
ACAM2000 cannot be used in pregnant women, infants or those who are immunocompromised exactly the people who most need protection from the monkeypox virus.

articles.description: Conservatives on Twitter slammed President Joe Biden's Thursday night speech calling for new 'assault weapons' bans in the wake of tragedies like the Texas school shooting.
